abstract: The Brooklyn artist Kenneth E. Parris III is on tour with members of the Merce Cunningham Dance Company, documenting their two-year Legacy Tour.
snippet: The Brooklyn artist Kenneth E. Parris III is on tour with members of the Merce Cunningham Dance Company, documenting their two-year Legacy Tour.
lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn artist Kenneth E. Parris III is on tour with members of the Merce Cunningham Dance Company, documenting, through a series of drawings and paintings, their two-year Legacy Tour. After 58 years the company is scheduled to disband on New Year's Day 2012. This is the 14th in a series of graphite drawings Mr. Parris plans to create from the road, providing a front-row seat to the final weeks of the company's journey. This week's entry is from Berlin.

headline.main: Drawing Dance: Preparing to Say Farewell
